# model parameters
F = np.array([[-0.9,0,0],[0,-0.9,0],[0,0,-0.9]])
c1 = np.array([1,1,1])
c2 = np.array([0,0,0])
H = np.array([[1,0,0],[0,1,0],[0,0,1]])
Q = np.array([[1,0,0],[0,1,0],[0,0,1]])
R = np.array([[1,0,0],[0,1,0],[0,0,1]])

# particle filter theoretical results
T=100, 1000 simulations, average MSE
forecast	MSE	standard deviation
0	1.21136149468	0.00136097691501
1	7.44813789288	0.00551472602592
2	9.57320310197	0.00709611613341
3	11.2938775279	0.00901031726201
4	12.7101291216	0.00974854040751
5	13.8388397533	0.0106551554806
6	14.7653653181	0.0121421752263
7	15.540340401	0.0126075679308
8	16.1633441422	0.0128352655547

# Training paramters:
Chain Length = 20
learning rate = 0.001, Adam optimizer
loss: pre_fit loss * 0.5 + post_fit loss

T=100, 1000 simulations, average MSE
